snippet.title: Super Mario Bros. Extreme Adventure - The Update 1.3 Trailer
snippet.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------ 
Super Mario Bros. Extreme Adventure Update 1.3 Official Trailer
------------------------------------------------------------------
Ladies and Gentleman! Today at 12:00 PM this Première will start with
so much new stuff about our mod, we spent all of our Summer and did the possible
for this Project and we have succeded on it. We enormously thanks the entire
Horizon Server for the support and 2 Special persons in our staff that made our dreams become real, Synel and G4L.
Thank you very much, you did so much for us and we are glad for it. Seriously. Thanks again.
Of course, we also thank all those outside the community who have encouraged us and given us advice 
on how to proceed in the development of what you are about to see. 
Having said that, between criticisms and compliments, we are happy to give you a good view and permanence 
in our official discord server. Heartfelt thanks and for your attention. 
- The Team Alternative
------------------------------------------------------------------
- Music:
Urchin Underpass - Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Music
https://youtu.be/9NlDINBlmec
Author(s): Shiho Fujii, Atsuko Asahi, Ryo Nagamatsu, Yasuaki Iwata
Platform: Nintendo Switch
!We do not own this song, we just used it for entertainment purposes! All rights reserved to Nintendo, no copyright infringement is intended.
------------------------------------------------------------------
- SOCIAL AREA -
------------------------------------------------------------------
- Server Discord of Our Team: https://discord.gg/V5PTrf2f9N
- Server Discord of Horizon Miraheze: https://discord.gg/JWXdjRq6tV
- Newer Team Site: https://newerteam.com/
- Alternative Team Site: https://teamalternativeinf.wixsite.com/teamalternative
------------------------------------------------------------------
- DOWNLOAD AREA -
------------------------------------------------------------------
Github: https://github.com/TeamAlternative2023/SMBEA/releases/tag/relase1.3
------------------------------------------------------------------
- DEVELOPERS AREA -
------------------------------------------------------------------
Mone: World 3 Maker, Code Compiler, Music Importer and Site Maker
Gatter: World 1,2 Maker, Russian Language Translation (FULL VERSION) and SFXs Recorder
Synel: Sprites and Game Features Code Programmer
Wakanameko: Japanese Language Translation and Boss Programmer FULL VERSION
Jacopo Plays: Beta Tester and HUD/Layout Designer
G4L: Model Importer
Bafio: Graphics Designer
------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANTE:
Questa MOD non è affiliata a Nintendo o al Team Newer, 
per quanto abbiamo utilizzato il loro materiale: non intendiamo guadagnare denaro e fama. 
Mario, Luigi e tutti i personaggi all'interno
del gioco sono per Copyright ©Nintendo.
ma speriamo unicamente che vi piaccia giocare a tale MOD.
Per qualsiasi dubbio o bug, contattateci mediante i nostri social, buon gameplay. ;).
Si ringrazia enormemente gli aiuti ricevuti dal server Discord e sito web di Horizion Miraheze.
Non sosteniamo la Pirateria
------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT:
This MOD is not affiliated with Nintendo or Team Newer, 
for what we have used their material: we do not intend to earn money and fame. 
Mario, Luigi and all the characters inside
of the game are for Copyright ©Nintendo.
but we only hope you enjoy playing that MOD.
For any doubts or bugs, contact us via our social networks, good gameplay ;).
We thank enormously the help received from the server Discord and website of Horizion Miraheze.
We not endorse Piracy
------------------------------------------------------------------
